title: Nicole Kidman and her lookalike sister Antonia visit a resort in Tennessee
text:
Nicole Kidman and her sister, Antonia, are known to have a very strong bond.

And the pair have been enjoying some quality time together at the picturesque Blackberry Farm resort in Tennessee this week.

Nicole, 52, shared a photo to Instagram on Thursday of herself and Antonia, 49, sitting in rocking chairs and watching the sunset.

Bonding time: Nicole Kidman and her sister, Antonia, watched the sunset at the Blackberry Farm resort in Tennessee on Thursday

Nicole wrote in the caption: 'Feeling the #Fall at Blackberry Farm.'

The Oscar winner also shared several snaps of the surrounding woodland, as well as a picture of herself holding a chicken.

It comes after the Kidman sisters shared a playful Halloween selfie earlier this week.

Farm life: The Oscar winner shared several photos to Instagram of the surrounding woodland, as well as a picture of herself holding a chicken (above)

In a photo shared to Nicole's account, the A-lister smiled while posing in what appeared to be a German barmaid costume.

'Early #Halloweenparty with my sis and our families,' she wrote in the caption.

Meanwhile, Antonia was pictured cosying up to her famous sibling in a black-and-white skeleton outfit.

Spooky! It comes after the Kidman sisters shared a playful Halloween selfie earlier this week

While Nicole may be the more famous of the two sisters, former journalist Antonia is also successful in her own right, having recently graduated with a law degree.

Antonia received her degree in April, with Nicole taking to Instagram to congratulate her on the huge achievement days later.

'Congratulations to my darling sister who graduated with her law degree two days ago,' wrote the Moulin Rouge! star. 'Studying, raising six kids and starting a new phase in her career, and she's doing it all with grace and humility.'
description: Nicole, 52, shared a photo to Instagram on Thursday of herself and Antonia, 49, sitting in rocking chairs and watching the sunset at the Blackberry Farm resort in Tennessee
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
